mapper.insert: insert into customer (customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_email, customer_contact, customer_birth, customer_gender) values ( #{customerId}, #{customerPw}, #{customerName}, #{customerEmail}, #{customerContact}, #{customerBirth}, #{customerGender} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY customer_id DESC) AS rnum, c.* FROM customer c ) AS tmp WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update:
UPDATE customer
customer_email = #{customerDto.customerEmail},
customer_contact = #{customerDto.customerContact},
customer_birth = #{customerDto.customerBirth},
customer_pw = #{customerDto.customerPw},
WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
update customer set customer_level = #{customerLevel} where customer_id = #{customerId}
update customer set customer_point = #{customerPoint} where customer_id = #{customerId}
UPDATE customer SET customer_point = customer_point - #{customerPoint} WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
UPDATE customer SET customer_point = customer_point + #{customerPoint} WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM restaurant r INNER JOIN pick p ON r.res_no = p.res_no WHERE p.customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT p.payment_customer AS customer_id, COUNT(p.payment_no) AS payment_success FROM payment p JOIN customer c ON p.payment_customer = c.customer_id WHERE p.payment_status = '예약완료' AND p.payment_time >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') AND p.payment_time < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH'), 1) GROUP BY p.payment_customer;
